mapper.insert: insert into t_power (id, `name`, intro, parent_id, `type`, url, sort, icon) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_power set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select * from t_power where 1=1
and `name` like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and parent_id = #{parentId}
order by sort

select distinct a.* from t_power a left join t_role_power b on a.id = b.power_id where 1=1 and b.role_id in ( select c.role_id from t_account_role c where c.account_id = #{id} ) and a.type = 0 order by a.sort
select c.*,d.role_id belong from t_power c left join( select a.id,b.role_id from t_power a left join t_role_power b on a.id = b.power_id where b.role_id = #{id} ) d on c.id = d.id order by c.sort
